---
title: "EQD Strat charts"
output: html_document

---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(dplyr)
source(file.path(getwd(), "..", "convenience.R"))
source(file.path(getwd(), "..", "plot_charts.R"))

emu_cycles <- data.frame(from = as.Date(c("1993-07-01", "2009-04-01", "2013-01-01")), 
                     to = c(as.Date(c("2008-04-1", "2011-10-01", "2018-12-31")))) 
```

```{r emu_pe_cycle,fig.height = 3, fig.width = 6}
plot_cycles_bbg("MXEM Index", "PE_RATIO", emu_cycles, 
            title = "PE Ratio, MSCI EMU, CEPR Business Cycles (Trough to Peak)",
            ylab = "PE Ratio") %>%
  format_plot("eqd_strat")

```

```{r emu_div_cycle,fig.height = 3, fig.width = 6}

plot_cycles_bbg("MXEM Index", "EQY_DVD_YLD_12M", emu_cycles, 
            title = "Dividend Yield, MSCI EMU, CEPR Business Cycles (Trough to Peak)",
            ylab = "Dividend Yield (%)") %>%
  format_plot("eqd_strat")

```
